channel.title: 0 Attack exp
channel.description: Is it anything special? I have 0 experience in attack. Just asking because people who have 0 exp in fishing or those kind of levels they are "special" accounts. Jw :P

*Davidude36: We do not talk about moparscape in my section.[/quote]

mopar fag/ please/ best server: http://runescape.com, i can give u 1bil xp in evy skill plz
